      • PIDControl

        public PIDControl(double Kp,
                  double Ki,

                  double setpoint,
                  double minOut,
                  double threshold)
        Parameters:
        Kp - - Double
        Ki - - Double
        Kd - - Double
        setpoint - - Double
        minOut - - Double representing the minimum output that the controller should output if not at the limit.
        threshold - - Double representing the maximum acceptable deviation from the setpoint.

      • getMotorPID

        public double getMotorPID(double error)
        Takes in the error value and returns the PID correction. The correction returned will be truncated to between -1.0 and 1.0, exclusive.
        Parameters:
        error - - Double
        Returns:
        Double representing the correction value
